text:
Hello. I'm new here and am trying to migrate from the HubSpot APIs to Private Apps. So far things are going well. However, I can't figure out how to get a list of contacts for a company. In the old APIs, I would do this:
```<https://api.hubapi.com/companies/v2/companies/$row->>company_id/contacts```
That doesn't work now. How can I get a list of contacts for a company?
